title: How Riot could avoid players leaving queue and champion lists and improving it.
body: Well i for one get tired of getting into a character screen get my champion in Aram and it be a darn good one ( which is rare)  And then a player gets mad about theirs and leaves to reset it.   Well here is my suggestion, Once in aram and a Champion has been selected they have to be stuck with that as their selection until they complete a minimum of 20 mins game play on that champion or until the match ends.  Dont let them be able to skip the Aram selection process if they get ashe and hate it then they have to be forced to play her unless traded or re rolled.   Just my simple thoughts on the matter.  Stops ppl from leaving aram to get a new selection.

replies.body: That's an interesting concept. I encourage you to post it on [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous), where this type of post will get more traction and interaction.
